text: :  . ,  . Regulatory Affairs Specialist (maternity leave position 01.12. 2022) for Pfizer. Main position goals: Execute all activities necessary for the registration of new products and for postapproval product support. Ensuring GMP Certificates confirmation in Ukraine. Ensuring local regulatory compliance. Skills, experience and qualifications required for the job: University degree in medicine or pharmacy. At least 2 years experience in registering medical products. Knowledge of Ukrainian legislation and requirements in registering medical products. Experience in work with regulatory systems and databases is desirable, but not obligatory. Fluent English (oral and written) is a must. Strong organizational skills and ability to meet deadlines. Responsibility, carefulness, punctuality. Good communication skills, ability to work in team. Driving Licence BTime management. Fluent English.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614832c3d8e42e2c4b8d5a07::headhunter_ua", "source": "headhunter_ua", "country": "UA", "company": "Staff Service", "position": "Regulatory Affairs Specialist for Pfizer", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

Regulatory Affairs Specialist (maternity leave position 01.12.2022) for Pfizer

Main position goals:

  • Execute all activities necessary for the registration of new products and for postapproval product support
  • Ensuring GMP Certificates confirmation in Ukraine;
  • Ensuring local regulatory compliance

Skills, experience and qualifications required for the job:

  • University degree in medicine or pharmacy
  • At least 2 years experience in registering medical products
  • Knowledge of Ukrainian legislation and requirements in registering medical products
  • Experience in work with regulatory systems and databases is desirable, but not obligatory
  • Fluent English (oral and written) is a must
  • Strong organizational skills and ability to meet deadlines
  • Responsibility, carefulness, punctuality
  • Good communication skills, ability to work in team

Ключевые навыки

Грамотная речь
Английский язык
Driving Licence B
Time management
Fluent English
"}
